name: Fahim Faysal
bio: I’m a Computer Science student at United International University (Class of 2026), passionate about building scalable, user-centric digital solutions. Skilled in full-stack web development (React.js, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL) and data analysis, I craft robust, high-impact applications — from real-time platforms to dynamic dashboards. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, C++, and Java, I thrive on clean code, system design, and agile collaboration via Git/GitHub. Driven by curiosity and a forward-thinking mindset, I aim to transform complex problems into seamless, meaningful digital experiences.
